quiz.title: Know it all?
quiz.instructions: Ok, dudes, so what do you REALLY know about alcohol? Give this quiz a spin and let's find out.

question.feedback: A drug is any substance (except food, water and oxygen) which affects or changes the function of human physiology (body) or psychology (mind).

question.text: Alcohol helps you to think clearly.
question.feedback: Alcohol is a downer, a depressant, it slows the brain and the nervous system and changes the way you think and feel.

question.text: Alcohol affects people in different ways.
question.feedback: Alcohol affects people differently depending on a number of factors like weight, gender, and mood.

question.text: A cup of coffee, vomiting and/or a short nap will quickly sober you up.
question.feedback: There's only one thing that will help you to sober up- time. It takes about an hour for each drink you've had, to be eliminated from your bloodstream.

question.text: A male and female of the same age, height and weight will always experience similar effects from drinking the same amount of alcohol.
question.feedback: Gender affects the way alcohol reacts on the individual because men have more muscle mass and women have more body fat even when they are of similar height and weight.

question.text: Alcohol will always help you to be friendly and sociable.
question.feedback: Alcohol depresses the brain often this affects the ability to make sensible judgements and causes you to be less inhibited, sometimes this can make you really aggro or miserable.

question.text: It's okay to take drugs with alcohol if they are prescription drugs.
question.feedback: It is always dangerous to mix any other drugs, even those prescribed by your doctor.

question.text: People with alcohol problems are loners, often homeless and unemployed.
question.feedback: Anyone can develop a drinking problem, successful and popular professionals, public identities or young people with caring families.

question.text: A 285ml glass of full strength beer does not contains the same quantity of alcohol as a 285ml glass of white wine.
question.feedback: Different sorts of alcohol, ie spirits and wine contain variable alcohol levels.

question.text: In some situations, it's legal for a person under 18 to buy alcohol
question.feedback: It is always illegal in Australia, for a person under 18 to buy alcohol.
